item.title: The Internet is Rotting
item.description: Terrific piece by Jonathan Zittrain, on The Atlantic, on link rot and digital preservation. I love how well documented and informative it is. Yet, it remains perfectly approachable for both the non-knowledgeable reader and the technically savvy. Too much has been lost already. The glue that holds humanityâ€™s knowledge together is coming undone. We need more content like this. Subscribe to the newsletter, the RSS feed, or follow @nicolaiarocci on Twitter
